entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers in the afternoon then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and risk of freezing rain. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
